snippet: A court in Paris threw out lawsuits that claimed illegal racial profiling by the police engaged in public identity checks and pat-downs.
abstract: Court in Paris throws out lawsuits that claimed illegal racial profiling by French police engaged in public identity checks and pat-downs.
lead_paragraph: A court in Paris threw out lawsuits that claimed illegal racial profiling by the police engaged in public identity checks and pat-downs.

headline.main: France: Court Throws Out Cases Claiming Racial Profiling by Police
headline.print_headline: France: Court Throws Out Cases Claiming Racial Profiling by Police
